attributes.name: Cure Disease
attributes.description: Cures all diseases.

attributes.name: Damage Health
attributes.description: Causes <strength> points of poison damage.

attributes.name: Damage Magicka
attributes.description: Drains the target's Magicka by <strength> points.

attributes.name: Damage Magicka Regen
attributes.description: Decreases the target's Magicka regeneration by <strength>% for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Damage Stamina
attributes.description: Drains the target's Stamina by <strength> points.

attributes.name: Damage Stamina Regen
attributes.description: Decrease the target's Stamina regeneration by <strength>% for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fear
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level <strength> flee from combat for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Alteration
attributes.description: Alteration spells last <strength>% longer for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Barter
attributes.description: You haggle for <strength>% better prices for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Block
attributes.description: Blocking absorbs <strength>% more damage for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Carry Weight
attributes.description: Carrying capacity increases by <strength> for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Conjuration
attributes.description: Conjuration spells last <strength>% longer for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Destruction
attributes.description: Destruction spells are <strength>% stronger for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Enchanting
attributes.description: For <duration> seconds, items are enchanted <strength>% stronger.

attributes.name: Fortify Health
attributes.description: Health is increased by <strength> points for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Heavy Armor
attributes.description: Increase Heavy Armor skill by <strength> points for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Illusion
attributes.description: Illusion spells are <strength>% stronger for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Light Armor
attributes.description: Increases Light Armor skill by <strength> points for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Lockpicking
attributes.description: Lockpicking is <strength>% easier for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Magicka
attributes.description: Magicka is increased by <strength> points for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Marksman
attributes.description: Bows do <strength>% more damage for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify One-Handed
attributes.description: One-handed weapons do <strength>% more damage for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Pickpocket
attributes.description: Pickpocketing is <strength>% easier for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Restoration
attributes.description: Restoration spells are <strength>% stronger for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Smithing
attributes.description: For <duration> seconds, weapon and armor improving is <strength>% better.

attributes.name: Fortify Sneak
attributes.description: You are <strength>% harder to detect for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Speech
attributes.description: +<strength> Speechcraft for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Stamina
attributes.description: Stamina is increased by <strength> points for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Fortify Two-Handed
attributes.description: Two-handed weapons do <strength>% more damage for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Frenzy
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level <strength> will attack anything nearby for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Invisibility
attributes.description: Invisibility for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Lingering Damage Health
attributes.description: Causes <strength> points of poison damage for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Lingering Damage Magicka
attributes.description: Drains the target's Magicka by <strength> points per second for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Lingering Damage Stamina
attributes.description: Drain the target's Stamina by <strength> points per second for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Paralysis
attributes.description: Target is paralyzed for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Ravage Health
attributes.description: Causes <strength> points of concentrated poison damage.

attributes.name: Ravage Magicka
attributes.description: Concentrated poison damages maximum Magicka by <strength> points.

attributes.name: Ravage Stamina
attributes.description: Concentrated poison damages maximum Stamina by <strength> points.

attributes.name: Regenerate Health
attributes.description: Health regenerates <strength>% faster for <duration> seconds.

attributes.description: Magicka regenerates <strength>% faster for <duration> seconds.

attributes.name: Regenerate Stamina
attributes.description: Stamina regenerates <strength>% faster for <duration> seconds.

attributes.description: Resist <strength>% of poison for <duration> seconds.

attributes.description: Restore <strength> Stamina.

attributes.name: Slow
attributes.description: Target moves at 50% speed for <duration> seconds.

attributes.description: Can breathe underwater for <duration> seconds.

attributes.description: Target is <strength>% weaker to fire damage for <duration> seconds.

attributes.description: Target is <strength>% weaker to frost damage for <duration> seconds.
